name: Flowerbomb Nectar
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Osmanthus, Orange Blossom, Gun Powder Accord.Fragrance Description:In this fragrance, blackcurrant and bergamot blend with jasmine and orange flower before meeting the warm scent of patchouli oil and vanilla perfume. Like reaching into a floral bouquet, this perfume for women is a deeper, more-intense take on the iconic floral fragrance that started it all..About the Bottle:The iconic luxe grenade fragrance bottle takes on a denser silhouette reminiscent of a blossoming rose in this iteration of the classic perfume. The deep-pink hue of this floral women's fragrance is shown through the crystal-clear glass, hinting at the sensual scent within..About the Fragrance:This intense floral perfume delves into the heart of the classic Flowerbomb perfume, emerging as an intoxicating elixir radiating notes of warm florals that evoke visions of distinctly feminine moments with each mist of this intense women's perfume.
ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Coumarin, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Methyl Anthranilate, Citral, Geraniol, Ci 60730/Ext. Violet 2, Ci 14700/Red 4.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_title: Scent is naturally sweet & lasts long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A wonderful natural sweet smell, not overbearing. The scent has the strength level that you can smell it but you want to sniff a few more times to really take it in. Exactly what I want in a perfume. The cherry medicine smell I read about is something only I can smell and lasts for the first 20 or so minutes that itu2019s freshly sprayed. Iu2019ve asked and my partner doesnu2019t smell it, I assume itu2019s a proximity to nose thing when itu2019s first exposed to oxygen.  Even 7 hours later and my skin smells and tastes sweet like a warm fizzy pear. I donu2019t love buying expensive perfumes but this scent is so unique, and the bottle I purchased in August is still half full (today is December 2nd). Itu2019s worth it for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a big fan of the Flowerbomb fragrances (I feel I should mention that I donu2019t typically go for florals too often), and I just recently bought the trio with the original, Ruby Orchid, and Nectar. I knew I already loved the other 2, and Iu2019d been just dying to finally try Nectar! Iu2019d heard so many incredible reviews of it! Now that I finally have it I have to say that It definitely doesnu2019t disappoint at all! I am just thrilled with it! Iu2019m kind of tied between Nectar and Ruby Orchid as to which is my favorite of the 3u2026 theyu2019re all so good, but those 2 both just have something extra special that the original doesnu2019t! Also, I typically prefer florals for the spring and summer seasons, but I really feel that Nectar works perfectly year round!   Nectar has that floral Flowerbomb base to it, but this one is much more sweet and fruity. The orange blossom note adds a yummy and sweet smell while the vanilla adds a lovely sweetness that warms the fragrance up. Iu2019d say itu2019s the most playful, flirty, and happy of the Flowerbomb fragrances! A grownup, gorgeous, deliciously sweet, fruity floral that belongs in everyoneu2019s collection!

reviews.review_title: a hidden dupe (that can stand on its own, too)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: flankers rarely steal the show, but i'd confidently say this one beats out the OG any day. the original flowerbomb is just so nothing to me.... she's a standard Flower Perfume From Macy's smell. nothing wrong with that if that's what you want, but it ain't exactly exciting. this lady, though? yeah she's sweet and bubbly, but there's a more refined side to her hiding under all the glitz. the real star of the show in this bottle is orange blossom - which, as we probably all know by now, is having a MAJOR moment. i gotta tell you, i can't really smell a difference between this and BK's Love, Don't Be Shy - if not an exact dupe, it puts you far enough into the ballpark that your typical nose couldn't smell a real difference. is this gonna be in my 'forever' collection? probably not. but i'm entering my 'having fun and getting silly with it' era, so i'll be dousing myself in this stuff until it stops sparking joy.

reviews.review_text: Not anywhere near as sweet as I expected from all the reviews!  Honestly I am not sure what I expected.  I am a long time wearer of Dior Addict.  To me, this smells exactly like the incense Iu2019ve burned for 20 years.(Which was called Jakarta Musk) In the opening, I smell incense mixed with marshmallowy-orange blossom sweetness.  Like Killian Love Donu2019t Be Shy and incense.  The dry down is soft, cool incense and a hint of vanilla.    I find this has moderate projection, and it wears close.  Even with 3 sprays, I find this subtle.  Maybe I am noseblind to this fragrance a bit, as it is so familiar.  Plus, I am used to the powerful sillage of Dior Addict, which I never ever used more than 1 spray of.  That stuff is powerful, Flowerbomb Nextar is  more subtle and close.  Longevity is moderate.  Sillage moderate.    I donu2019t find this fruity or overly sweet, or metallic.  Incense and sweetness that dries down to rich and soft incense.  Worth trying, but not a safe blind buy for most I think.  Took me a few days to warm up to it, but now I appreciate it.  Not likely to replace Addict for me though.

It smells a lot like the pink sugar I used to wear in college. Maybe a little more refined though. Iu2019m going to keep wearing it and see if the people around me like it. Iu2019m not 100% sure if I like the scent on me. I can only handle two small sprays on my wrists. Itu2019s very strong and lasts a very long time. If you love sugary, overly sweet scents then this is definitely for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can't give Viktor & Rolf fragrances enough credit for making such a beautiful scent with amazing lasting power! Super sweet, long lasting, fruity, and slightly floral that's definitely one of my favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is very sweet! Imagine a thick syrup of straight sugar mixed in with the OG Flowerbomb. Iu2019m pretty sure itu2019s the benzoin in there as it reminds me of Burberry Her Intense. Iu2019m not saying they smell the same, but the could be cousins with that syrupy sugar quality. I was worried about the gun powder note, however Iu2019m happy to report I donu2019t really smell it. Maybe I smell a slight deepness or smokiness but I couldnu2019t pick it out if I didnu2019t know it was in there. I say try Nectar if you wanted to like Flowerbomb but felt it was too sharp and had too much Patchouli. The OG gives me migraine but this is much better. It has awesome projection and longevity and I only need 1 spray max on my neck/chest. Anything more I would choke myself out from the sweetness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i got a sample of this and was really excited to try it because vanilla is my favorite note and i thought it would be really good with the orange blossom. when i first sprayed it all i could smell was the gun powder, and now itu2019s been on for about 35 minutes and all iu2019m getting is licorice mixed with a doctoru2019s office, like other reviews have said. iu2019m honestly disappointed as that is not what i was expecting at all. i like the original flowerbomb a million times better, and i can easily mix it with some of my other perfumes that have vanilla.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019m usually not a big fan of floral scents but i love this! it lasts all day and is definitely one of my new favorites

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is my all time favorite! I love the original one too, but this one lasts all day and is sultry and sweet. Beautiful packaging too.

reviews.review_title: Amazing, long lasting and very unisex
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There are so many fragrances marketed for women and men, that really need to be used by anyone who likes the scent.  I love the original Flowerbomb, but since my Mom wears it frequently, it just smells like her (not a bad thing, but not for me).  Nectar is deeper and warmer and the odd, but faint gunpowder note really makes this fragrance amazing.  My skin eats scents, and this Nectar lasts almost all day on my skin and days on clothes.  I cannot recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite scent hands down and I own over 30 bottles of perfume. I reach for this the most!

reviews.review_title: nectar is the perfect name for this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: okay so I used to wear this when it first came out I worked at a Sephora. I never bought the full bottle but I would rotate wearing this and Kilian Princess while I was at work (I ended up buying princess). I was surprised when my bf gifted me a bottle of this he said it reminded him of me and it was an instant love again. I love orange blossom and vanilla in fragrance and this has both.  I prefer my sweet scents to have something to kick the sweetness or a hint of something spicy, in this itu2019s the metallic note. Itu2019s perfectly blended yet Iu2019m able to distinguish some of the notes. Orange blossom lightens the syrupy sweet vanilla notes and the gunpowder gives the top notes a bit of an edge, while the patchouli in the base mixes well with the vanilla to keep it from getting sickly sweet. I would almost think this perfume has fruity notes to it. it smells like you took some fresh & ripe berries, a squeeze of orange juice and vanilla and heated that up and reduced to a syrup. Thatu2019s exactly what this sweetness smells like to me. The added notes of gunpowder and patchouli keep this from staying just a jammy sweet fragrance. I donu2019t think itu2019s a good blind buy just bc itu2019s SO sweet and I know some people donu2019t like the metallic note. For me itu2019s very wearable day, night, summer, winter etc. It lasts for weeks on clothing and literally all day on skin and my skin eats up fragrance. The performance on here is one of the best of designer fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had a sample in a bag where I keep all my fragrance samples. Thereu2019s a lot of them, so this got lost and I didnu2019t test it enough. Omg, what a stunner! More intense, impactful, sexy, and that gunpowder note.. So good. I bought a big bottle. I prefer this to the original, which was more patchouli. What I get from this one is that big gunpowder edge, big flowers, and big tonka bean.

reviews.review_title: LORT HAVE MERCY!!! I finally bought it!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not realize that this Flowerbomb nectar was u201cintenseu201d version. Had no clue, but boy oh boy now I do now!! Iu2019m a huge Flowerbomb junkie okay? But when you add a twist on that classic, and make something LIKE THIS? Omg! I have been wanting this ever since I laid my eyes on this and smelled it! In my opinion, it beats FLOWERBOMB I know right, but something about that gun powder, Iu2019m not sure, but this stuff right here will get you anybody and anything you WANT!! Itu2019s pricey, but worth every penny!!! Good gracious I could go on and on how much I love this! I am a u201cWarm floral/Earthy/Gourmand kinda person, and this just blew me away. This is me in a bottle. Iu2019ve always said u201cBlack Opiumu201d was? Well, it still is, but now I have another one! I mean Iu2019m not playing. Run, donu2019t walk, run and go buy this if you love Flowerbomb. I got the 1.7 oz for 130$ and it was worth every penny. When I get 170 guess what? Iu2019m getting that one too!! This is amazing!! 3 sprays behind your ears, neck, wrists, and of course your clothes, and people will follow you around like a lost puppy dog. I finally got it yu2019all. I have zero regrests. This is perfection in a bottle. This is better the few. This is better than midnight Bloom. This is BETTER THAN THE OG FLOWERBOMB!! How?!! I need to know the answers to these questions!

reviews.review_text: I have been in love with this scent ever since I got it as a sample from Sephora. I decided to pick this up during the VIB sale and havenu2019t stopped wearing it since. This is a pretty sweet smelling perfume in my opinion so if you donu2019t like sweeter perfumes you probably wonu2019t like this. The bottle is super cute and this will last me a while. I will also be picking up the original flowerbomb during the spring Sephora sale. Definitely recommend Viktor&Rolf perfumes!

I get so many compliments and get asked what Iu2019m wearing. I sometimes will think that the scent has left hours later until someone brings up how good I smell. Itu2019s long lasting and just amazing!

But as I was going on with my shopping at the plaza I couldnu2019t stop smelling my hand. The sweet but not to sweet and floral scent had me addicted. Idk what it is about this perfume but it smells so good!! Just try it for yourself I think its worth the buy!

I absolutely love this scent for cool spring days and winter! It's extremely sweet, warm, and smells like marshmallows, but beware, when I say extremely sweet, I mean EXTREMELY. If sweet isn't your thing, I'd say skip this and get the original flowerbomb. It lasts long and the packaging is very nice!

I don't buy expensive perfume typically and I wanted to give this a try since it was a sample...I am so glad I didn't buy it, because I would have cried spending the money that it costs!

Every time I wear it I get fairy vibes, but at the same time it is so elegant! Truly a gem.

This was worth every penny in my opinion.

I just love this fragrance! It was my wedding day fragrance, and I could smell it almost whole day! Even now when I put it on, it brings me memories - but also smell is so beautiful that my wedding is really not the only thing I think about when I wear this one, rather more I fell great wearing it! I do like it better than just flower bomb and there is quite the difference. Itu2019s long lasting, and if you like sweet and strong yet elegant perfumes you will not regret this one. As soon as I smelled this I was blown away and I immediately said I NEED this ! I bought the 1.7 ounce right away and let me tell you this fragrance is beautiful so sweet long lasting AMAZING. I get so much cotton candy from this but a mature cotton candy not childish. I am a gourmand lover if you love sweet scents you need to try this one . It is very strong and long lasting I can smell it all day long I would say lasting power is 10/10 maybe 9 hours ? Itu2019s the most long lasting perfume I have. There are also a lot of floral notes I get in this too but itu2019s mainly cotton candy flower bouquet with a beautiful sweet orange scent. Must have!

reviews.review_text: I typically do not go for intense room filling fragrances. Iu2019m more into subtle fragrances that will turn heads when you quickly walk by. I do smell some citrus, so that lightens things a bit. The metallic note does add a unique spin to this otherwise generic sweet floral. I think you will get loads of compliments as this is a pretty safe crowd pleasing scent. Itu2019s not unique, but itu2019s nice enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

A scent better suited for the colder months because of its warm floral intensity, I  prefer this to the original Flowerbomb. I do appreciate both, but this one is a little bit more interesting and unique. Very long-lasting on my skin!

reviews.review_text: I thought I would love this since I love the original Flowerbomb. Unfortunately, no. It is an overly sweet synthetic scent that ruined the parfum for me. I tried applying it again after I showered, thinking that maybe on clean skin with no lotion it might help. No - the florals changed again to a synthetic smell. The nectar must be the issue in this (with me anyway). I will stick to the original.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve sampled the original. Itu2019s ok but everyone on the planet wears it so thatu2019s cause enough for me to not want to purchase/wear it. This nectar version though is perfect and kinda smells a little differently on diff people Iu2019ve noticed. Itu2019s the same floral with the (non obnoxious version) of vanilla added to it. Itu2019s sweet but itu2019s got a little hint of citrus added to it to bring it a little closer to the u201cfreshu201d side vs the u201cfloral vanillau201d side. Donu2019t get me wrong, itu2019s still got the floral & vanilla but they arenu2019t so strong and in your face as the original. The original is more basic where this to me is more fresh, sexy. Itu2019s very similar to Black Opium to me but I would say this one is the daytime, year round version of Black Opium (which has the spicy, nighttime, Winter vibe). reviews.review_text: This perfume is HEAVENLY!!! I used to wear the original Flowerbomb, a few years ago. While I did like the scent overall, there was always something about the original that just wasn't quite me. When I discovered Flowerbomb Nectar, I was delighted! It has everything I like about the original Flowerbomb, but goes deeper into a sweet/sugary scent rather than floral. It is a very classy, feminine, and sexy perfume. I wish I could give it 6 stars! It has become my new go-to, and it LASTS all day! (For scent reference, I tend to go for perfumes that are sweet, vanilla-y, warm, and sometimes with a hint of spice. My other favourites include Prada Candy, Comptoir Sud Pacifique in Vanilla Extreme, La Vie Est Belle, and Pink Sugar. If you enjoy any of those, then you will love this perfume too!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got a peel off sample card of this with my VIB order.  Was opening said sample cards Varies with my daughter, and this one grabbed both of our attention.  Sat the card on my dresser and I noticed a wonderful smell when walking past the dresser, but it did not pervade the whole room.  I am very sensitive to fragrance and usually buy a rollerball or travel size of a fragrance first, to make sure it agrees with me, however this is not available in a pocket size.  To my surprise, the large Sephora in the mall actually gives fragrance samples by pouring some into a tiny spray dispenser.  I sat this on my dresser, as the original card wore off pretty quickly, and noticed an amazing raspberry like scent whenever I walked by.  When I spritz it on my wrists, however, I seem to get more of the gunpowder scent than the underlying gourmand notes that I love so much.  So two samples, both which gave off alluring but not overpowering scents while just sitting in place, but with different notes depending on the delivery system.  Neither of those yummy notes were primary when worn on my skin however.  Also, it wore off rather quickly when two spritzes were placed on wrists and rubbed together.  So IDK if the differing performance was due to the different delivery methods and might differ still when used directly from a retail bottle, so I am in a conundrum.  It is not inexpensive, and I donu2019t wear perfume regularly, just on evenings out.  I donu2019t want to smell like gunpowder, and I am not sure why it was added to the product, I assume to balance the sweetness.  But it is the sweetness that I prefer, whether the Tonga bean/vanilla notes from the cardboard sample, or the raspberry/fruity notes from the sample bottle.  Also, it really wore off quickly, which would be extremely disappointing if the notes I loved were prominent.  I guess the answer is to try and get back to a store and spritz it directly from bottle to body.  Probably not a good idea to order online.

After leaving I kept thinking about this scent and decided I wanted to get it, and it has become my favorite sweet, floral scent.  I bought the original Flowerbomb about a year and a half ago, but ended up returning it the same day unopened for the Chloe perfume; I tried both on in store and found I preferred the Chloe as I did the rest of my shopping.  I definitely prefer this to the original Flowerbomb, although at this point I wouldn't have a distinct memory of the scent of it.  In comparison to Chloe, this has almost more of a sugary scent, which sounds kind of weird, but ends up smelling like flower-y candy on the skin.  I would highly recommend!

reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing!! I guess something changes with age because I was a die hard Marc Jacobs Daisy girl for 5 years and since last year Iu2019ve been on the hunt for a new fragrance. Not knowing whether I wanted a similar floral bright scent like MJ Daisy or something brand new, I started branching off into warmer scents. Enter V&R Flowerbomb Nectar! I got a sample scent with one of my online orders and I couldnu2019t stop thinking about it! The price kept me at bay for a while, so I went to Sephora and spritzed myself with Flowerbomb Nectar and just wore it, testing out the longevity, how it plays off my body pH, and how husband likes it. I did this twice and ended up purchasing!! It lasts all day. Itu2019s warm, sweet and sensual. I love it. My husband loves it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing!!! My favorite from my 18 bottle collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Head over heels in love with this tried and true scent!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was a fan of the original Flowerbomb YEARS ago.  The scent became too popular and played out, so I moved on to other scents. Fast forward to May 2018, Iu2019m on the hunt for a new fragrance (Iu2019ve never been able to stick to just one) and to my surprise the Nordies Associate introduces me to Flowerbomb Nectar u2013 it smells DIVINE!! Itu2019s indescribable u2013sweet yet musky, sultry yet soft = itu2019s a very alluring scent with good staying power. I think the attraction for me is the gunpowder accord that it contains. Iu2019m drawn to musky fragrances and it doesnu2019t hurt that the scent also contains jasmine (love). I hope they expand the line to include a body lotion/cru00e8me, shower gel or a dry oil. I really LOVE this scent and itu2019s become my new favorite!
Smells amazing, and lasts all day on me!

And so far the scent still lingers on me after 4+hrs and hopefully all day long without having to reapply. I've been searching for a long lasting fragrance and I think I just found it. reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and fell in love instantly. I always loved the original, but the heavy dose of patchouli overwhelmed me and eventually caused some migraines. And I tried Bonbon but got this old, musty, 80u2019s smelling drydown from it. There was a note that just didnu2019t agree with me. This is so perfect! You can definitely smell the orange and gunpowder, it dries down to a smoky orange. My daughter said u2018it smells like cotton candy dipped in chocolate!u2019 Sheu2019s 6 so take it how you will, but itu2019s a more refined, adult version of some of the sugary scents you can find out there. The only thing preventing me from purchasing is the price! I understand itu2019s an EDP, but $120 for a small bottle! Wow! It is that good though, so Iu2019ll just have to save up and splurge in a few months.

reviews.review_title: Long lasting but not for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t care for the original Flowerbomb so I was hoping this would be different as I love some of the notes in it. Orange blossom is my jam, and I have a need to smell anything that has it in it. Unfortunately this doesnu2019t smell as great as I thought it would. If anything, it actually reminds me of root beer which over time made me feel nauseous.   The good thing (but not good for me at the time) is that the smell does last a LONG time. Which wasnu2019t great for me given how the smell made me feel. I also do love the bottle, itu2019s stunning!   So two stars for longevity, one for bottle design, and a loss of two solely because I canu2019t stand the smell. Itu2019s not a bad perfume, just not for me! I would recommend it to someone that does like sweeter smells.

I love this perfume!!!!!!! I love flower bomb but this summer I want something sweet but not floral and different and when I went to look for a perfume today I saw flower bomb nectar and loved it right away...   Flowerbomb - warm and spicy  Flowerbomb nectar - warm and sweet

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely hybrid of the original Flowerbomb with a very pretty sweetness that takes the edge off the original. So there's no confusion - I love every single Flowerbomb, have them all, and will continue to be a #1 fan. But this one is very nice!  This sweetness is not cloying or overpowering. It doesn't shock your senses - it's a warm, comforting scent that stays with you for a long time. It seems the longer it melts into your skin the softer and warmer it gets. Just a beautiful scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried to make myself like the original Flowerbomb but I was not a fan! The og Flowerbomb was a bit nauseating for me and it was such a shame because I was quite fond of the bottle. Enter Flowerbomb Nectar! It's Flowerbomb's sweeter, bit more subtle cousin; inoffensive and suitable for daily wear. It would make a perfect gift for any fragrance newbie as it still has that beautiful presentation. Even my friend who gets a headache from every fragrance ever finds this pleasing, which says a lot!

reviews.review_title: A sweeter Flowerbomb that is just as great!

reviews.review_text: I am not sure I would call this warm and spicy but it is amazing. In my opinion, it is more sweet and warm. It reminds me of Flowerbomb with Pink Sugar. It has a little bit of a cotton candy scent to it like Pink Sugar. I was so excited to see that we got it in the US finally! I had tried it in Iceland and was immediately in love! It also lasts really well on my skin. I could still smell it after 12 hours of traveling. Another great from Viktor and Rolf.

reviews.review_title: I could smell this all day
